introduction: SYNOPSISHi-jeong's mother lives only for her daughter's happiness. But she accidentally kills someone and receives a sentence of seven years. As her mother goes to jail, Hi-jeong quits college, breaks it off with her fiancee Yu Dong-hun, and follows in her mother's footsteps to become a hostess. Hi-jeong turns down a marriage proposal from Jun-hyuk, a businessman of a mid-sized company. She meets Dong-hun again and they start to live together. When she miscarries their child, Hi-jeong leaves Dong-hun again and returns to her life as a hostess. Released after seven years in jail, Hi-jeong's mother and Hi-jeong take a walk together and talk about the life of woman.故事母亲山只有幸福熙 - 荣格无意中犯谋杀罪doeja接受判处七年徒刑熙 - 荣格是女主人踩退了学，甚至与她的未婚夫刘某Donghun分手回到了她母亲的方式。拒绝中年商人俊和的婚姻请求的黑鹤居住在孝顺，和她一起住。七年后，母亲和弟弟走上了女人生活的故事。
